meanings.definition: A shallow metal pan used for holding burning coals or embers.
meanings.sent1: The camper placed the firepan under the grill to keep the fire going.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith used a firepan to carry the hot coals to the forge.
meanings.sent3: When the firepan started dancing around, everyone knew it was time to roast marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a firepan, holding onto the warmth of his words.
meanings.sent5: The firepan glowed red, illuminating the faces around the campfire.

meanings.definition: A pan used for carrying or holding fire.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter grabbed the firepan to contain the small blaze.
meanings.sent2: She carefully carried the firepan filled with embers to the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to bat at the firepan, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like a firepan, holding the intensity of his emotions.
meanings.sent5: The firepan crackled as it held the warmth of the burning logs.
